full_summary:
==============================================

### Title

Biological and Technical Support Services: Central East Coast Vancouver Island

### Reference

Reference Number: PW-22-01005960
Amendment Number: 0
Solicitation Number: 30003252

### Tender Details

*   **Language:** English and French
*   **Consolidated Labour Market:** Canada
*   **Delivery Location:** British Columbia
*   **Suppliers:** Open to all qualified contractors
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Tender Status:** Exired (due to the deadline being earlier than listed here.)
*   **Services Required**
    *   Technical support to salmon enhancement projects and habitat enhancement/restoration projects undertaken by local community groups and volunteers.
    *   Educational programs for students from Kindergarten to Grade 12, as well as First Nations, local communities, and external parties.
*   **Expected Outcome**
    *   Community Involvement Program (CIP) projects shall be carried out in a technically sound manner.
    *   Educational programs are expected to encourage participation in cooperative fisheries and watershed stewardship activities.

### Documents

You can access the [Request for Proposal (RFP) documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/01/01a00fdac0164503e997a22535eb53f1/30003252_-_rfp_en.pdf). Please see the document for any language requirements of any other procedures documents that vendors may be required to complete.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:

Lavoie, Claire
DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
506 282 2340

Fredericton
NB
E3C 2M6, Canada
